com.github.daytron.simpledialogfx.dialog

Class WarningDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • com.github.daytron.simpledialogfx.dialog.WarningDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public final class WarningDialog
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The Warning Dialog class that provides a single user response option, OK.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera

        Accepts two String parameters for the constructor.

        details - The text for message details

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(URL url,
                       ResourceBundle rb)
        Initializes the dialog. Set default focus to OK button. Wrap the text for details message label and apply the user-defined header and details.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
        rb - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
